data.comment: Today's referee, Jong Hyeok Kim, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Seongnam's half.
In the minute 6, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seoul at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seongnam have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 14, Seongnam advance rapidly upfield but Jong Hyeok Kim blows for offside.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Seongnam drives forward and Yu In-soo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 15, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Can Seongnam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seoul's half?
In the minute 19, Seoul needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Seongnam in Seongnam.
Park Chu-young (Seoul) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 21, Seongnam's Na Sangho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Seoul defender.
Seongnam are coming forward and Yu In-soo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Seoul at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
Seongnam's Na Sangho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Seongnam's half.
At Tancheon Sports Complex, Seongnam are penalized for being offside.
Yoon Jong-gyu of Seoul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seongnam to check on Na Sangho, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Na Sangho returns to the field for Seongnam after picking up a slight injury.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Se Jong Ju is booked for the away team.
Park Chu-young for Seoul drives towards goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Seoul to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Osmar Barba (Seoul) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jong Hyeok Kim will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Seoul's Kim Won-sik is back in action after a slight knock.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kim Won-sik.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 51, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Seoul's half.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Na Sangho (Seongnam) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
In the minute 57, Seongnam push upfield but Jong Hyeok Kim quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Jo Yeong-uk is replacing Jung Han-min for the away team.
In the minute 64, Seoul have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 66, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Se Jong Ju with Han Seung-gyu.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 74, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seo Bo-min is replacing Kim Hyeon-seong for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Seoul are pushing forward but Osmar Barba's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Jo Yeong-uk gives Seoul a 0-1 lead.
Kim Jin-ya instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 83, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Seongnam make their second substitution with Yang Dong-hyeon replacing Park Tae-jun.
Sung-Yueng Ki is on a sub for Kim Jin-ya for Seoul.
In the minute 84, Free kick Seoul.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 87, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 88, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nam Il Kim (Seongnam) is making a third substitution, with Tomislav Kis replacing Na Sangho.
Yang Dong-hyeon (Seongnam) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In Seongnam, Seongnam push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's full-time at Tancheon Sports Complex. The final score is 0-1.
